query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(week_start_date) AS month, sum(total_overdose_related_911_calls) AS total_calls, week, year WHERE week_start_date >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY month, week, year ORDER BY year, month

week_start_date.description: The (Sunday) date when the week number started.

total_overdose_related_911_calls.description: The total number of overdose-related 911 calls that occurred during the week.

week.description: The week number when the overdose-related calls occurred. Week 1 is the first full week of reporting each year.

year.description: The year when the overdose-related calls occurred.

table_metadata.title: Overdose-Related 911 Responses by Emergency Medical Services
table_metadata.description: This dataset includes all opioid overdose-related 911 calls responded to by emergency medical services in San Francisco, filtered by opioid involvement and/or naloxone administration.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Healthcare providers, public health officials, policymakers, researchers

whom_it_may_interest: Healthcare providers, public health officials, policymakers, researchers
